div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 685 Sacalasau, 30 km. NE of Oradea, Ru- mania, 1935 Burial: 1st cent. B.C.? (Mitrea) Contents: 31+ AR. Pot hoard with AR jewelry Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Roman Rep.: den. Disposition: Cluj 8 (dr.); L. Ruzicka 23 (dr.) Popescu, Dacia 1937-40, p. 192 Information from M. Macrea
